scripts.build: npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.build:css: cleancss -o static/css/style.min.css static/css/style.css && brotli static/css/style.min.css && gzip -k static/css/style.min.css
scripts.build:js: terser static/js/main.js -o static/js/main.min.js && brotli static/js/main.min.js && gzip -k static/js/main.min.js
